scripts.clean:images: docker images -a | grep none | awk '{ print $3; }' | xargs docker rmi --force
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:images
scripts.dev: npm run dev:install && npm run dev:upgrade && npm run dev:prettify
scripts.dev:install: npm run dev:install:engine_utils && npm run dev:install:orchestrator && npm run dev:install:studio && npm run dev:install:documentation
scripts.dev:install:engine_utils: cd engine_utils && npm run upgrade && npm run build
scripts.dev:upgrade: npm run upgrade && npm run dev:install:engine_utils && npm run dev:upgrade:orchestrator && npm run dev:upgrade:studio && npm run dev:upgrade:documentation
scripts.dev:prettify: npm run dev:prettify:orchestrator && npm run dev:prettify:studio && npm run dev:prettify:documentation
scripts.first-time: npm i -g -f npm-check-updates yarn serve && npm run dev:install
scripts.version: yarn conventional-changelog --config changelog.config.js -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md
